    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class gameClient.GameData.AgentBasic

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AgentVG​(PokemonGameData gameHandler, int id, int src, Pokemon pokemon)
      this is the advanced agent that would use GROUPS in order to find pathing more efficeintly, and reduce the amount of "collisions" between other agents, it can be further improved.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void evaluateTarget()
      this is a method that we use when we got an update from the server, we want to make sure our target still exist, and if maybe it can be overitten.
      protected void getNextTarget()
      get the next Target group or (first) pokemon in the group
      boolean hasTarget()
      Check if we have target, and make sure the group not empty
      protected void onIdle()
      when the agent is idle and does nothing, a.k.a the agent is at a Node, but not on edge.

      Set the group target
      boolean updateTarget()
      make sure the target is still valid
